jol.types.operator
Class ScanJoin

java.lang.Object
  jol.types.operator.Operator
      jol.types.operator.Join
          jol.types.operator.ScanJoin
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Operator>
public class ScanJoin
extends Join

The ScanJoin operator joins the input tuples with some table along some set of common variable names. The tuples that pass the join are sent to the output.
